Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Chicken Heterophil Peptide 2 (CHP2,  CHP-2, gallinacins, natural AMPs; avian beta-defensin, UCSS1a; birds, animals; 3S=S)

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:three disulfide bonds.Activity: active against C. albicans (MIC 16 ug/ml), B. avium (MIC 16 ug/ml), E. coli (MIC 16 ug/ml), S. enteriditis (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. typhimurium (MIC 8 ug/ml), C. jejuni (MIC 4 ug/ml), P-multocida (MIC >16 ug/ml), M. gallisepticum (MIC 16 ug/ml) (Evans et al., 1995. Also, S. aureus.Updated 7/2021, Jan2023; 12/2024.
Literature Information.Author: Evans EW, Beach GG, Wunderlich J, Harmon BG.1994
Literature Information.Title: Isolation of antimicrobial peptides from avian heterophils.
